title: Edebits
overview: Edebits is a 'green' series with ecological values and set in a scientific base in Antarctica where 10-years old Bet lives with her parents. One day, she accidentally creates 5 bits – the edebits – who become alive inside her computer, and immediately become best friends. The edebits and their world of technology will join Bet in her adventures filled with action, friendship, solidarity, teamwork and lots of humor.
